HediffDef.description: [PAWN_defName] used to be a human, but by whatever means has now been transformed into this current form. In this state, [PAWN_pronoun] can be reverted.
HediffDef.label: former human

HediffDef.description: [PAWN_defName] is a creature that should never have been, a fusion of two beings which mutated to become one animalistic monstrosity.
HediffDef.label: 2x merged morph

HediffDef.description: [PAWN_defName] used to be a human, but the mechanites in [PAWN_possessive] system have forgotten his prior form -- [PAWN_pronoun] is now sealed in this form for the rest of [PAWN_possessive] life. Reversion serums will not work.
HediffDef.label: permanently feral

HediffDef.description: [PAWN_defName] was turned into an animal, but [PAWN_pronoun] got better. However, [PAWN_pronoun] is not too happy about it.
HediffDef.label: was animal

HediffDef.description: [PAWN_defName] was joined with another person in a chaotic mash of flesh and flesh, but finds the insight valuable.
HediffDef.label: was melded

HediffDef.description: [PAWN_defName] was joined with another person in a chaotic mash of flesh and flesh, and is scarred from the experience.
HediffDef.label: was melded

HediffDef.description: [PAWN_defName] was turned into an animal, but [PAWN_pronoun] got better. However, [PAWN_pronoun] takes it as a learning opportunity.
HediffDef.label: was animal
udder
HediffDef.description: This really needs no explanation. [PAWN_nameDef] now produces milk.

HediffDef.label: chemical udder
HediffDef.description: Not so much an udder as a sac full of chemfuel, [PAWN_nameDef] now produces chemfuel.

HediffDef.label: wooly
HediffDef.description: Thick wool grows over [PAWN_nameDef]'s body constantly. They can shave themselves.

HediffDef.label: egglayer
HediffDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] can now lay eggs. Don't ask, don't tell. It's rather embarrassing.

HediffDef.label: clawed
HediffDef.description: Sharp, catlike claws have replaced the shed nails of [PAWN_nameDef]. This gives [PAWN_objective] a combat advantage, and makes it harder to wipe [PAWN_pronoun] ass.

HediffDef.label: horns
HediffDef.description: Burly horns decorate [PAWN_nameDef]'s head.

HediffDef.label: antlers
HediffDef.description: Burly antlers decorate [PAWN_nameDef]'s head.

HediffDef.label: thrumbohorn
HediffDef.description: A razor-sharp thrumbo horn decorates [PAWN_nameDef]'s head.

HediffDef.label: muzzle
HediffDef.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a canine. [PAWN_pronoun] teeth are pointed to suit, and this makes speaking more difficult, yet eating is easier.

HediffDef.label: warg muzzle
HediffDef.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a canine. [PAWN_pronoun] teeth are pointed to suit, and this makes speaking more difficult, yet eating is easier.

HediffDef.label: wolf muzzle
HediffDef.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a great canine. [PAWN_pronoun] teeth are pointed to suit, and this makes speaking more difficult, yet eating is easier.

HediffDef.label: canine muzzle
HediffDef.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a husky. [PAWN_pronoun] teeth are pointed to suit, and this makes speaking more difficult, yet eating is easier.

HediffDef.label: vulpine muzzle
HediffDef.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a fox. [PAWN_pronoun] teeth are pointed to suit, and this makes speaking more difficult, yet eating is easier.

HediffDef.label: ursine muzzle
HediffDef.description: A massive snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a canine. [PAWN_pronoun] teeth are pointed to suit, and this makes speaking more difficult, yet eating is easier.

HediffDef.label: snout
HediffDef.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face.

HediffDef.label: cervine snout
HediffDef.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, deerlike with a wide nose, picking up scents of predators.

HediffDef.label: rodent snout
HediffDef.description: A ratty snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, long teeth for chewing through anything.

HediffDef.label: wooly snout
HediffDef.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, wooly and with lips perfect for spitting.

HediffDef.label: boomasnout
HediffDef.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, snuffling and sniffing for the telltale scent of chemfuel.

HediffDef.label: thrumbo snout
HediffDef.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, luxuriously fluffy and inspiring a commanding gaze.

HediffDef.label: porcine snout
HediffDef.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, snorting and snuffling for roots and berries, oinking at things that [PAWN_pronoun] likes.

HediffDef.label: tusked snout
HediffDef.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, along with two pointy tusks perfect for rooting up vegetables.

HediffDef.label: trunk
HediffDef.description: A trunk graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, along with two pointy tusks, a wonderful elephantine accessory.

HediffDef.label: bovine snout
HediffDef.description: A cowlike snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face. They may moo and talk about bovine-related things every now and then.

HediffDef.label: beak
HediffDef.description: A beak graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a chicken. They may bok and squawk about birdlike things.

HediffDef.label: feline eye
HediffDef.description: Slitted, yellow eyes are now [PAWN_nameDef]'s to keep. They are keener and rather enticing to look at.

HediffDef.label: vulpine eye
HediffDef.description: Bright, foxy eyes are now [PAWN_nameDef]'s. [PAWN_pronoun] will see better, and charm people with their exotic appearance.

HediffDef.label: tail
HediffDef.description: A regular tail.

HediffDef.label: thrumbo tail
HediffDef.description: A fluffy thrumbo tail, coated in supple, sleek fur.

HediffDef.label: hairless tail
HediffDef.description: A ratty tail, hairless, long and snaking.

HediffDef.label: elephant
HediffDef.description: A tail of an elephant. It swishes gently at flies that gather.

HediffDef.label: wolfish tail
HediffDef.description: A regular tail.

HediffDef.label: cow tail
HediffDef.description: A cowlike tail. It swats at flies and hangs low at their legs.

HediffDef.label: short tail
HediffDef.description: A short tail juts out from [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine, flaring up whenever danger is sensed.

HediffDef.label: bear tail
HediffDef.description: A short tail, like that of a bear. Not much of a tail, really.

HediffDef.label: curly tail
HediffDef.description: A pig's curly tail, it twitches when food is near.

HediffDef.label: hairy curled tail
HediffDef.description: A boar's curly tail, it twangs when a truffle is detected.

HediffDef.label: wooly tail
HediffDef.description: A wooly tail, it feels like a cloud.

HediffDef.label: fluffy tail
HediffDef.description: A wonderfully fluffy fox tail drapes from [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine. Was that a small wag just then?

HediffDef.label: curled fluffy tail
HediffDef.description: A wonderfully fluffy husky tail curls over [PAWN_nameDef]'s back. Was that a small wag just then?

HediffDef.label: tufted tail
HediffDef.description: A thin tail with a tuft of fur at the end.
Fur has covered the entirety of [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb, giving it a soft fine coat that helps retain warmth.
HediffDef.label: furred
feathered
HediffDef.description: Rows of feathers have sprouted over [PAWN_nameDef]'s arm, keeping in some warmth...and no, it doesn't let them fly.
A plume of feathers sprout from a dimpled chicken tail above [PAWN_nameDef]'s butt.
HediffDef.label: tailfeathers
thickly furred
HediffDef.description: A heavy coat of fur drapes across this limb, insulating a lot of heat.

HediffDef.label: hide
HediffDef.description: A thick leathery hide has formed over this limb, adding some natural defense.
A very thick, rough and leathery skin now covers this limb, adding a substantial natural defense.
HediffDef.label: thick hide
paw
HediffDef.description: Cute but inflexible paws have replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s hands. They lack a thumb, which has receded into a useless dewclaw.

HediffDef.label: elephant foot
HediffDef.description: Thunderous stomping follows [PAWN_nameDef] everywhere they go.

HediffDef.label: huge paw
HediffDef.description: Massive, clawed and deadly paws have replaced the finer thumbed hands of a human. While less useful for manipulation, they make [PAWN_nameDef] a beast in a fight.

HediffDef.label: dextrous paw
HediffDef.description: Thankfully, this more manipulative paw allows [PAWN_nameDef] to keep their thumbs.

HediffDef.label: wingtip
HediffDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingers have disappeared into a lump of bird-skinned flesh, with many feathers protruding from the nub.

HediffDef.label: wing
HediffDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s entire arm has contorted and feathered into a wing, however it is not strong enough to allow them to fly. But that's like, the best bit dude!

HediffDef.label: avian
HediffDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s toes stretch out into long birdlike claws, perfect for grasping things or scratching at people's faces.

HediffDef.label: paw
HediffDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s feet have stretched out, growing a coat of fur, the toes shortening to clawed digits.

HediffDef.label: rodent
HediffDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s feet are dextrous and elongated, but hairless and pale.

HediffDef.label: elephantine
HediffDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s leg is thick and covered in a solid grey hide.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s toenails have thickened and grown into a veritable hoof, with a split down the middle.
HediffDef.label: cloven hoof

HediffDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s feet have shifted into a single-toed hoof, like a horse's.
HediffDef.label: hoof
hoof
HediffDef.description: It's terrifying, but [PAWN_nameDef]'s hands are nothing more than hooves now. Holding things, grabbing things and doing anything requiring thumbs is going to be a lot more difficult.

HediffDef.label: trotter
HediffDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s hands resemble trotters more than anything else, leaving them with little in the way of grasping ability.

HediffDef.label: trotter
HediffDef.description: Smaller hooves now sit where [PAWN_nameDef]'s feet once were. Pointed things, they are.

HediffDef.label: digitigrade
HediffDef.description: The shape of [PAWN_nameDef]'s legs reminds one more of a beast than a human, for they now stand on their toes instead of their heel, which has elongated. This does however, put a spring in their step.

HediffDef.label: ursine
HediffDef.description: Rounded, fuzzy ears sit atop [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. They're very slightly better at hearing than a human's ears.
Big fuzzy triangles crown [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, pivoting and flicking back to every sound they sense. They're very sensitive, so please don't shout.
HediffDef.label: vulpine
